description:
Lori & Loru are two voluptuous twin sisters who begin working at the institute as lab assistants. They`re sexy and fanservicey, yet in the time of need they`re also smart and brave.
The twin sisters pilot the robot Million Alpha in the Mazinkaiser manga and sequel movie.
Loru usually dressed in pink and was the older sister. Her hair color was slightly different, in two shades of blonde.
name: Rooru
